channel.title: A Project Portfolio To Grow on Uday | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in A Project Portfolio To Grow on Uday | Portfolio

item.title: MCP Gateway
item.description: Built an edge-native API gateway that unifies multiple AI providers, implements usage-based billing through a credit system, and supports Model Context Protocol for advanced AI applications.

item.title: Enterprise ETL Pipeline
item.description: Built a modular ETL system that reduces manual data collection time by 90%, extracting data from multiple sources via APIs and browser automation into a unified PostgreSQL warehouse.

item.title: Vendor Management Platform
item.description: Built a comprehensive vendor management platform that handles vendor onboarding, document management, job matching, and communication workflows using Next.js, Supabase, and modern web technologies.

item.title: RAG-based Catalog System for ONDC
item.description: Built a retrieval-augmented generation system that understands complex product taxonomies and delivers instant, accurate results for e-commerce catalog management.

item.title: AI Research Agent for Medical ML
item.description: Created an intelligent agent that helps doctors and researchers automatically generate, test, and validate machine learning pipelines for their specific research needs.
